title: Apple relish
ingredients: ['1 rounded teaspoon mustard seeds', '900g (2 lb) cooking apples, coarsely grated', '40ml (1 1/2 fl oz) red wine vinegar', '300g (11 oz) soft brown sugar', '1 tablespoon grated lemon rind', '3 bay leaves', '110g (4 oz) seedless raisins, roughly chopped', '1 large onion, finely diced', '4 cloves garlic, peeled', '2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1 dessertspoon ground ginger', '1 tablespoon salt']
